class Solution {
        int MOD = 1_000_000_007;
    public int countWays(int[][] ranges) {
        Arrays.sort(ranges, (a, b) -> a[0] == b[0] ? a[1] - b[1] : a[0] - b[0]);
        int count = 1;
        int maxRight = ranges[0][1];
        for (int i = 1; i < ranges.length; i++) {
            if (ranges[i][0] > maxRight) {
                count++;
            }
            maxRight = Math.max(maxRight, ranges[i][1]);
        }
        return fastPow(2, count);
    }
    public int fastPow(int base, int pow) {
        long result = 1L;
        while (pow != 0) {
            if ((pow & 1) == 1) {
                result = (result * base) % MOD;
            }
            base = (base * base) % MOD;
            pow >>= 1;
        }
        return (int) result;
    }

}

//total_testcases:32
//total_correct:25
//input_formatted:[[57,92],[139,210],[306,345],[411,442],[533,589],[672,676],[801,831],[937,940],[996,1052],[1113,1156],[1214,1258],[1440,1441],[1507,1529],[1613,1659],[1773,1814],[1826,1859],[2002,2019],[2117,2173],[2223,2296],[2335,2348],[2429,2532],[2640,2644],[2669,2676],[2786,2885],[2923,2942],[3035,3102],[3177,3249],[3310,3339],[3450,3454],[3587,3620],[3725,3744],[3847,3858],[3901,3993],[4100,4112],[4206,4217],[4250,4289],[4374,4446],[4510,4591],[4675,4706],[4732,4768],[4905,4906],[5005,5073],[5133,5142],[5245,5309],[5352,5377],[5460,5517],[5569,5602],[5740,5791],[5823,5888],[6036,6042],[6096,6114],[6217,6262],[6374,6394],[6420,6511],[6564,6587],[6742,6743],[6797,6877],[6909,6985],[7042,7117],[7141,7144],[7276,7323],[7400,7456],[7505,7557],[7690,7720],[7787,7800],[7870,7880],[8013,8031],[8114,8224],[8272,8328],[8418,8435],[8493,8537],[8600,8704],[8766,8812],[8839,8853],[9032,9036],[9108,9189],[9222,9291],[9344,9361],[9448,9502],[9615,9673],[9690,9800],[9837,9868],[85,96],[145,202],[254,304],[372,411],[534,551],[629,692],[727,787],[861,944],[1041,1084],[1133,1174],[1260,1307],[1339,1358],[1478,1548],[1580,1618],[1694,1814],[1848,1891],[1936,1990],[2058,2130]]
